briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of SPD503 in Combination With Psychostimulants
officialTitle: A Phase III, Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Multi-Center, Dose Optimization Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of SPD503 in Combination With Psychostimulants in Children and Adolescents Aged 6-17 Years With a Diagnosis of Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of SPD503 in subjects with ADHD when co-administered with psychostimulants in children and adolescents aged 6-17 years with a diagnosis of ADHD with a sub-optimal, partial response to stimulants.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder Rating Scale-fourth Edition (ADHD-RS-IV) Total Score at Week 8 - Last Observation Carried Forward (LOCF)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline and weekly up to 8 weeks
